attributes.additional_details:
If a company, now matter where they are based, if they are given money for a product or service within the UK, they should pay tax on that money they are paid for that product or service.
Then there will be no reason why Amazon/Starbucks/google/Npower etc can have dinner with the heads of tax office and come to cosy agreements and not pay what they should..
All those over complicated rules, regulations..
there would be just one rule to follow,, you get paid,, you pay tax...!!!

Simple...
